title: game randomly freeze and i can still hear background music
body:
hi, i restarted a couple of months ago to play league of legends, but sadly a crash keeps happening randomly and now much more often

basically during game, totally randomly (can happen in earl mid late game, or even not even happen sometimes) a crash happens, it makes the screen black, pc freezed and i can still hear the background music of the game

I can't alt+tab, i can't ctrl+alt+del, i even tried to wait some time, nothing happens, all i can do is pressing the reset button, then the game restarts regularly (usually don't last enought for another crash to happens)

i tried EVERYTHING on your bugsplat guide, i followed line for line the things you suggested to check, i don't know now what to do else, since i really like this game but support doens't reply to anything i wrote

windows reinstalled
league of legends reinstalled
my graphic card totally cleaned, nvidia drivers reinstalled
temperature of the gpu checked, on the registry after the crash, they were normal
all the bugplat suggestions followed

really i got no idea what to do else, i read that some other ppl are having this issue aswell, so maybe we could be able to make a serious thread about it?

replies.body:
If you're running Windows 10, then this is likely related to the issue with the Windows Game Bar. Follow [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to disable this feature entirely to see if anything changes.

Let me know if these steps helped.
